post.summary: Save a snapshot to the repository.
post.description: Saves a snapshot to the repository and returns the URI to retrieve it in the future. If an identical snapshot is already present, no update will occur and the URI for the existing snapshot will be returned.

get.summary: Retrieve a snapshot resource by it's hash ID.

parameters.name: snapshotId
parameters.description: ID of the snapshot to return.

put.summary: Save a snapshot to the repository.
put.description: Saves a snapshot to the repository and returns the URI to retrieve it in the future. If an identical snapshot is already present, no update will occur and the URI for the existing snapshot will be returned.

parameters.name: snapshotId
parameters.description: ID of the snapshot to save.

delete.description: Warning: Snapshots are shared resources and should only be deleted when all references to them have expired or been deleted. For example, two independent objects snapshot the same customer data, which returns the same SnapshotID. Deletion of the first object should not automatically delete the snapshot as it may still be in use by the second.

parameters.name: snapshotId
parameters.description: ID of the snapshot to delete.

get.summary: Retrieve a status report on the WebApi's operational status.

Returns a list of modules (libraries) and versions that are used by
            the application at runtime.
